education.title: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya (JNV)
education.description: Activities and Societies: • Was NCC Cadet for 2015-2016 of NCC Directorate Bihar & Jharkhand and Unit 34 Bihar Bn NCC. • Acquired 2nd position in SA Firing in June 2015 and 3rd position in Mini Marathon Run (5Km) on 24thJan 2016 organized by NCC. • Participated in the 1st International Day of Yoga on 21st June 2015. • 2nd position in the 100-meter race held during an annual sports event in December 2015. • Won 3 gold medals and annual sportswomen of the year trophy during an annual sports event in December 2014.

projects: [{"title":"DSA Search Engine","start_date":"May 2022","end_date":"May 2022","description":"This web development project basically is building a Search Engine dedicated to finding Data Structure and Algorithm problems.The project is on a search engine which takes an input from a user in the search box and returns top 10 matches of DSA Problem from the database for this project consists of around 1500 questions. This project was built using python, JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, and CSS."}]
